select * from( select rownum rn, TMP.* from( SELECT DISTINCT c.cart_no, c.cart_item_no, c.users_id, c.cart_qty, c.volume_no AS cart_volume_no, p.product_no AS p_product_no, p.product_name, p.product_detail, p.product_price, p.strength, p.brand_name, p.top_note, p.middle_note, p.base_note, p.attachment_name, p.attachment_type, p.attachment_size, p.image_url, v.volume_no AS v_volume_no, v.product_no AS v_product_no, v.volume_ml, v.volume_stock, v.volume_price FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN product_detail_view p ON c.cart_item_no = p.product_no LEFT OUTER JOIN volume v ON c.volume_no = v.volume_no AND c.cart_item_no = v.product_no WHERE c.users_id = 'siwoosiwoo' ORDER BY c.cart_no DESC
)TMP ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select * from cart where cart_item_no =#{cartItemNo} and users_id=#{usersId} and volume_no =#{volumeNo}
mapper.update: update cart set cart_qty =#{cartQty} where users_id=#{usersId} and cart_no=#{cartNo}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_no, cart_item_no, users_id, cart_qty, volume_no) values(#{cartNo}, #{cartItemNo}, #{usersId}, #{cartQty}, #{volumeNo})
mapper.delete: delete from cart where users_id=#{usersId} and cart_no = #{cartNo}
